abstract: Fed up with the spam and malware that is affecting its site, Facebook is partnering with McAfee to provide free anti-virus software to its 350 million users for six months.
snippet: Fed up with the spam and malware that is affecting its site, Facebook is partnering with McAfee to provide free anti-virus software to its 350 million users for six months.
lead_paragraph: It looks like Facebook has finally gotten fed up with all the viruses and spam that is plaguing the social network and ensnaring and embarrassing its 350 million members.

headline.main: Facebook Joins With McAfee to Clean Spam From Site
